most_active_tickets.title: Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all
[Linux Mint] Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"

common_issues.title: Pieces OS launch crash due to missing hardware support
common_issues.description: Multiple users are experiencing crashes during Pieces OS launch after upgrading to version 11.1.1. The issue stems from the 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extension requiring AVX2 hardware support, which is missing on some systems. The Pieces team is aware of the problem and is actively working on a fix. A patch is expected to be released within 24-48 hours.

related_issues.title: Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all
related_issues.text:
Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all
### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

For the past week, anytime that I launch pieces I see this: 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/61f18fb6-8846-46d8-8747-5c415fd2e82d)

Pieces OS just doesn't open, no matter what.

I tried to reinstall everything, but also no progress.

How to fix it? (Also to mention, Pieces desktop app is in Early Access program, but I don't know if this information is useful)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key points:**

* User @GetReal444 reported an issue with Pieces OS booting up.
* The issue appears to be related to the inability to load the 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extension due to a missing hardware requirement (AVX2 support).
* This issue is affecting more users than initially expected.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Mark from the Pieces team is actively working on resolving the issue and expects a patch within 24-48 hours.
* Tsavo from Pieces confirmed a release to fix the issue is expected by EOD tomorrow (2025-02-13).

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue is currently under investigation and a fix is being developed.
* Users experiencing this issue are advised to provide a screenshot of their machine's tech specs. 

**Additional information:**

* This issue may be related to other reported issues (#624, #625).

**Focus on most important details:**

* This summary highlights the key issue with the CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch extension, the hardware requirement causing it, and the timeline for a resolution.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS crash immediately after launch
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS crash immediately after launch
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After upgrade PiecesOS to version 11.1..1 it crashes every time immediately after launch. Previous version worked well. Attached is the crash report log.

Environment: 

- OS MacOS 15.2
- CPU Intel 

[trace.log](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18777512/trace.log)
## Summary of GitHub issue conversation:

**Key points raised:**

* User `gonzososa` is experiencing issues launching PiecesOS after updating to 11.1.0 on their M1 Mac.
* The issue seems related to the new vector library having avx2 issues on different systems.

**Problems identified:**

* PiecesOS is unable to launch on the user's system.
* Issue is related to the new vector library and avx2 incompatibility.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* The `pieces-support-bot` suggests checking related issues and resources.
* Tsavo from Pieces team acknowledges the issue and informs about a planned release with a fix the next day.
* Nathan from Pieces requests information about the user's CPU to further diagnose the problem.
* Tsavo suggests running specific commands to gather system information.

**Current status/outcome:**

* A fix is expected to be released the next day.
* User is encouraged to try the new release and report back.
* User is asked to provide additional system information for further diagnosis.

**Additional notes:**

* The conversation is ongoing and the outcome is not yet finalized.
* The user can follow up with the Pieces team for updates and assistance.

related_issues.title: Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
related_issues.text:
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Faccing "DatabaseException(Unable to load 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extenstion" (1), code : can'tOpenFile)" on my ubuntu desktop 
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation:

**Key points:**

* User Rohit0072 reported an issue with the Pieces app not booting up.
* The issue has been automatically routed to the relevant team member.
* Mark from the Pieces team provided contact information and apologized for the inconvenience.
* Tsavo from the Pieces team mentioned related issues and informed that a fix will be released soon.

**Problems identified:**

* The Pieces app was not booting up for user Rohit0072.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* A fix for the issue is expected to be released by the end of the day on February 13, 2025.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue is expected to be resolved with the upcoming release.
* User Rohit0072 has been informed and advised to wait for the update.

common_issues.title: Pieces App Launch and Performance Issues
common_issues.description: Users reported Pieces app freezing, failing to launch, or encountering database errors on Linux and Windows. Issues are linked to Flutter TextFields, stricter hardware requirements in version 11.1.1, and database extension loading. Workarounds include disabling on-screen keyboards and patches are being released to address the problems.

related_issues.title: [Linux Mint] Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
related_issues.text:
[Linux Mint] Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces app goes unresponsive and freezes a lot when trying to do anything, like trying to type in copilot chat or navigating through the menus. Can't use pieces app at all! Tried reinstalling it, but it made no difference. Desktop app version is 3.3.6

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e75595c0-31c8-4560-b08b-9ad3de8af6ab
## GitHub Issue Summary: Pieces App Freezing on Linux Mint

**Key Points:**

* User @94tejas reported the Pieces app freezing on their Linux Mint system.
* The issue was related to the use of TextFields in Flutter apps on certain versions of Linux Mint.
* A workaround was found by disabling the on-screen keyboard in accessibility settings.

**Problems Identified:**

* The Pieces app was freezing for some users on Linux Mint.
* The issue was caused by a known bug in Flutter that affects TextFields on certain versions of Linux Mint.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* As a workaround, users were advised to disable the on-screen keyboard in accessibility settings.
* The Pieces team is tracking the Flutter issue and will patch the app as soon as a fix is available.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is currently closed, with the workaround in place.
* The Pieces team will continue to monitor the situation and update the app when a permanent fix is available.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS was unable to launch.
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS was unable to launch.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

latest

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7a6a7957-5aa1-4d53-b492-cf4470aa5edc)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points Raised:**

* Users are experiencing issues launching the Pieces desktop app, specifically with version 11.1.1.
* The problem appears to be related to stricter hardware requirements.
* The user, @DevWizard24, reported the issue and was advised to provide support logs.

**Problems Identified:**

* Pieces app version 11.1.1 is causing launch failures for some users due to stricter hardware requirements.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The Pieces team identified the issue and planned to release a patch within 24-48 hours (as of 2025-02-11).
* @mark-at-pieces requested support logs from affected users to aid in troubleshooting.
* A related issue (#625) was identified by @tsavo-at-pieces.
* A release to address the problem was scheduled for the following day (2025-02-13).

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The patch was expected to be released on 2025-02-13 to resolve the launch issues caused by stricter hardware requirements in version 11.1.1. 


**Additional Notes:**

* The conversation indicates that this is an ongoing issue being actively addressed by the Pieces team.

recommendations: "Investigate and address the root cause of the Pieces OS launch crashes related to the 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extension and missing AVX2 hardware support. Consider providing backward compatibility or clear system requirements communication."

"Improve communication with users regarding known issues like the Pieces app freezing on Linux Mint. Provide clear workarounds like disabling on-screen keyboards and update users on the timeline for permanent fixes."

"Prioritize resolving the Pieces app launch and performance issues on Linux and Windows, specifically focusing on Flutter TextFields, stricter hardware requirements, and database extension loading problems."
